name: is_even_test_cases
docstring: Tests is_even with positive, negative, and zero values.

name: next_collatz_test_cases
docstring: Tests next_collatz for both even and odd inputs.

name: collatz_steps_test_cases
docstring: Tests collatz_steps with known sequence lengths including n=27.

name: collatz_max_value_test_cases
docstring: Tests collatz_max_value with known peak values including n=27 reaching 9232.

name: test_rustfmt_passes
docstring: Checks that code is properly formatted with cargo fmt.

name: test_clippy_passes
docstring: Checks that code passes clippy lints with no warnings.

name: COMMIT_COUNT
docstring: Ensures at least 10 commits (1 per subproblem branch + 1 merge each).

name: BRANCH_COUNT
docstring: Ensures at least 6 branches (main + 5 subproblem feature branches).
